OR FUN_INTE_ARRAY(LEVEL_PRIV,#{levelId}) > 0
OR USER_PRIV = '@all' OR DEPT_PRIV = '@all' OR LEVEL_PRIV = '@all' ) ORDER BY CREATE_TIME ASC LIMIT ${page},10
